it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class SpawnpointBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Block
      • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.SpawnpointBlock

  • public class SpawnpointBlock
extends Block
    This class represents all blocks of the spawnpoint type, which allow a player to grab and put back weapons and also they are the starting blocks of the match

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CoinColor color
      This property represents the CoinColor associated to the spawnpoint
      private java.util.List<Weapon> weapons
      This property stores the weapons that are currently available in the spawnpoint

    • Constructor Summary

      Class constructor given the position in the board, every BoarderType, the color of the spawnpoint and the weapons it contains

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpawnpointBlock

        public SpawnpointBlock(int row,
                       int column,
                       BorderType borderNorth,
                       BorderType borderEast,
                       BorderType borderSouth,
                       BorderType borderWest,
                       CoinColor color,
                       java.util.List<Weapon> weapons)
        Class constructor given the position in the board, every BoarderType, the color of the spawnpoint and the weapons it contains
        Parameters:
        row - an int representing the row of the block in the board
        column - an int representing the column of the block in the board
        borderNorth - BorderType of the northern border
        borderEast - BorderType of the eastern border
        borderSouth - BorderType of the southern border
        borderWest - BorderType of the western border
        color - the color associated to the spawnpoint
        weapons - the weapons contained in the spawnpoint

    • Method Detail

      • getWeapons

        public java.util.List<Weapon> getWeapons()
        This method gets the weapons that are available in the spawnpoint
        Returns:
        a list of the available weapons

      • grabWeapon

        This method allows for a weapon to be grabbed from the spawnpoint
        Parameters:
        weapon - the weapon to grab

      • dropWeapon

        This method allows for a weapon to be put back in the spawnpoint
        Parameters:
        weapon - the weapon to drop

      • getColor

        public CoinColor getColor()
        This method gets the color of the spawnpoint
        Returns:
